page.title: 03FEATURES PAST & PRESENT
page.content: {PRINCIPAL FEATURES PAST & PRESENT { }WISBECH & UPWELL TRAMWAY 5. The journey from Upwell to Wisbech by tram took one hour .There were more people than freight so the journey took longer in the daytime. 6.It took 10 minutes to travel from Outwell Basin to Outwell Village. 7.It cost 4d. to travel 1st class from Outwell Village to Wisbech. It cost 3d. to travel 2nd class . 8.It cost 3d. 1st class to travel from Upwell to Outwell Basin and 2d. 2nd class 9.Luggage under 28lbs. was allowed on free of charge.
